name: CVE-2018-8432
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Graphics Components handle objects in memory, aka "Microsoft Graphics Components Remote Code Execution Vulnerability." This affects Windows 7, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Office Word Viewer, Office 365 ProPlus, Microsoft Excel Viewer, Microsoft PowerPoint Viewer, Windows Server 2019, Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows 10, Windows Server 2008.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:word_viewer:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:office_compatibility_pack:-:sp3:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:-:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:r2:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:-:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:excel_viewer:2007:sp3:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2019:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:1809:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:office_365_proplus:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:office:2016:*:mac_os:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:office:2019:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:powerpoint_viewer:2007:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
